div.head: 肝膽心火
div.div: liver fire gallbladder fire and heart fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: liver fire gallbladder fire and heart fire

sense.def: Combined Designation of gan huo 肝火 , liver fire, dan huo 膽火 , gallbladder fire, and xin huo 心火 , heart fire. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：黃連平肝膽心 火 , “ Huang lian soothes liver fire, gallbladder fire and heart fire ”.
